title: Apply uploaded profile photo in Hero section

requirements.text: Add the user-uploaded image as the site profile photo by placing it as a static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg`, using the uploaded file `cropped_circle_image-1.png` as the source input, and ensure the existing Hero avatar `` continues to load from `/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg`.

quotes: add this as profile photo in site its not done yet

acceptanceCriteria: A file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg` and is derived from `cropped_circle_image-1.png`.
When the app is loaded, the avatar image in the Hero section displays the new photo (no broken image icon).
The Hero section avatar image `src` remains `/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg` (no backend dependency for image loading).

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only UI library).
Do not edit files in `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, or `frontend/src/main.tsx` (immutable paths).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; do not add additional backend services.
nonGoals: Adding user-upload functionality for profile photos.
Storing profile photos in the backend canister.
Changing the user's name, title, or other CV content.
